alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 2:59PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...Showers with gusty winds will impact portions of Jackson County through 400 PM EDT... At 259 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers along a line extending from near Leslie to 6 miles northeast of Jonesville. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jackson... Brooklyn... Grass Lake... Vandercook Lake... Leoni... Spring Arbor... Napoleon... Sandstone... Norvell... Pulaski... Concord... Horton... Hanover... Oak Point... Rives Junction... Sunset Beach... Michigan Center... Munith... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
